Sketchup .WALK Plugin¶

Our Sketchup plugin is compatible with Sketchup 2015-2019. You can export from any other version using the OBJ Export Method

Project Information¶

Your project coordinates will be imported as well as any views you have set up.

Model Preparation¶

The Exporter will export everything that is visible in the view. Please hide objects and layers that does not require exporting.

Exporting a .WALK File¶

  1. Open a project in Sketchup that you wish to export for VR Walkthrough.

  1. Select the Export To LUX Walker menu item or click the Icon.

Sketchup to VR 1

  1. Click the Export Lux Walker button on the Tenebris Lab section.

Sketchup to VR 2

  1. Click Change to change the location of the export.

Sketchup to VR 3

  1. Type in the File Name for your project, then click Export to start the export process.

Sketchup to VR 4

  1. Open the .WALK file in LUX Walker by double clicking or selecting in LUX Walker.

Sketchup to VR 5

Enjoy your WALK
